SELECT trl.return_number number, trl.return_date date, ts.supplier_name supplierName, trlg.goods_code code , trlg.goods_name name, trlg.goods_model model, tgt.goods_type_name goodsType, trlg.goods_unit unit, trlg.goods_num num, trlg.total total
FROM t_return_list trl LEFT JOIN t_return_list_goods trlg ON trl.return_list_id = trlg.return_list_id LEFT JOIN t_supplier ts ON trl.supplier_id = ts.supplier_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_type tgt ON tgt.goods_type_id = trlg.goods_type_id
